revision.text:
'''Key Items''' are special items obtained by player as they progress through the game. ==Usage== These items are active since their acquisition. To see acquired Key Items go to Start Menu > Items > Key Items. [[File:KeyItems11.png|Currently available Key Items]] ==List of Items== {|class="wikitable sortable" ! ! Name ! How to obtain ! Effect |- | [[File:Teachy_tv.png|24px]] | [[Teachy TV]] | Given by [[Professor Oak]] at the start of the game | N/A |- | [[File:Coin_case.png|24px]] | [[Coin Case]] | Given by [[Professor Oak]] at the start of the game | N/A |- | [[File:Pokeball_bag.png|24px]] | [[Pokéball Bag]] | Given by [[Professor Oak]] at the start of the game | N/A |- | [[File:Town_map.png|24px]] | [[Town Map]] | Get 10 kills on [[Kanto]] Route 1 | Unlocks Town Map panel |- | [[File:Factory_key.png|24px]] | [[Factory Key]] | Currently unobtainable | N/A |- | [[File:Dungeon_ticket.png|24px]] | [[Dungeon Ticket]] | Purchasable at [[Towns & Cities|Viridian City]] for 100 [[Quest Points]] {{Questpoints}} | Allows entry to [[Dungeons|dungeons]] at the cost of [[Dungeon Tokens]] {{dungeontokens}} |- | [[File:Super_rod.png|24px]] | [[Super Rod]] | Get 10 kills on [[Kanto]] Route 12 | Allows water Pokémon to be encountered and caught in the wild |- | [[File:Holo_caster.png|24px]] | [[Holo Caster]] | Currently unobtainable | N/A |- | [[File:Mystery_egg.png|24px]] | [[Mystery Egg]] | Get 10 kills on [[Kanto]] Route 1 | Opens [[Pokemon Day Care]] |- | [[File:Safari_ticket.png|24px]] | [[Safari Ticket]] | Clear the Fuchsia Gym in [[Kanto]] | Allows entry to the [[Kanto]] [[Safari Zone]] |- | [[File:Wailmer_pail.png|24px]] | [[Wailmer Pail]] | Unlock [[Kanto]] Route 14 | Allows entry to the [[Farm]] |- | [[File:Explorer_kit.png|24px]] | [[Explorer Kit]] | Purchasable at [[Towns & Cities|Cinnabar Island]] for 5000 [[Quest Points]] {{Questpoints}} | Allows entry to the [[Underground]] |- | [[File:Event_calendar.png|24px]] | [[Event Calendar]] | Currently unobtainable | N/A |- | [[File:Shard_case.png|24px]] | [[Shard Case]] | Defeat the Indigo League in [[Kanto]] | Allows collecting [[Shards]] |- | [[File:DNA_splicers.png|24px]] | [[DNA Splicers]] | Clear the [[Giant Chasm]] dungeon in [[Unova]] | N/A |} {{Key Items}}
[[Category:Key Items]] [[Category:Items]]
revision.comment: Added the "How to obtain" for DNA Splicers and Shard Case
